item.title: The Witcher 3:Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine. "Final Quest" launch trailer
item.description:
The Witcher 3:Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine. "Final Quest" launch trailer

"THE LAND OF WINE IS DRENCHED IN BLOOD" For the last time become professional monster slayer Geralt of Rivia and explore Toussaint, a remote land untouched by war, where you will unravel the horrifying secret behind a beast terrorizing the kingdom. Blood and Wine is a 30+ hour adventure full of dark deeds, unexpected twists, romance and deceit.

item.title: Official Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles™: Mutants in Manhattan - Launch Trailer
item.description:
Official Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles™: Mutants in Manhattan - Launch Trailer

Battle alongside your brothers through the sewers, subways, and streets of NYC to take down Shredder and Krang's evil organization, Foot by Foot. Unleash custom combat skills and powerful team combos to save Manhattan from the overwhelming dark forces growing in the shadows.

item.title: Xbox - June Games with Gold
item.description:
Xbox - June Games with Gold

Play together with Xbox Live Gold. June's Games with Gold lineup for Xbox One includes Goat Simulator and The Crew. For Xbox 360 owners, (and through Xbox One backwards compatibility) June kicks off with Super Meat Boy, followed by XCOM Enemy Unknown.

item.title: This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale + Xbox 360 Super Sale
item.description:
This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale + Xbox 360 Super Sale

Here are this week's games and add-on deals on the Xbox Games Store. Discounts are valid now through 30 May 2016.

item.title: Xbox at E3 2016: More FanFest and Streaming Details
item.description:
Xbox at E3 2016: More FanFest and Streaming Details

E3 is only a few weeks away, and we here at Xbox are hard at work getting ready for the big show. As we announced recently, we'll be kicking off with the Xbox E3 2016 Briefing, which you can watch live beginning at 9:30 a.m.

item.title: This Week on Xbox: May 20, 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: May 20, 2016

This week includes Mirror's Edge Catalyst news, a new Forza Motorsport 6 expansion, the release of Call of Duty: Black Ops on Xbox One through Backward Compatibility and more!

item.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt -- Blood and Wine "New Region" Trailer
item.description:
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt -- Blood and Wine "New Region" Trailer

Become professional monster slayer Geralt of Rivia and explore Toussaint, a remote land untouched by war, where you will unravel the horrifying secret behind a beast terrorizing the kingdom. With all trails leading to dead ends, only a witcher can solve the mystery and survive the evil lurking in the night.

item.title: Forging Ahead - The Halo Forge Experience Comes to Windows 10 PC
item.description:
Forging Ahead - The Halo Forge Experience Comes to Windows 10 PC

From the very beginning, community creations have been central to the Halo experience. From stacking up grenades underneath an unsuspecting Warthog to multiplayer movie-making, the Halo sandbox has always been fertile soil for millions of moments and memories created for, and by, the fans.

item.title: Warframe: Vauban Prime Now Available On Xbox One
item.description:
Warframe: Vauban Prime Now Available On Xbox One

VAUBAN PRIME ACCESS IS HERE! Vauban Prime and the newest Prime Gear have arrived to Warframe! Outmaneuver your enemies with the deadly expertise of Vauban Prime Access! Get Vauban Prime Access now and make the newest Prime yours - instantly - including Vauban Prime, Fragor Prime, Akstiletto Prime, and exclusive Customizations only available through Prime Access!

item.title: Forza Motorsport 6 NASCAR Expansion Trailer
item.description:
Forza Motorsport 6 NASCAR Expansion Trailer

America's favorite motorsport arrives to Forza Motorsport 6. The NASCAR Expansion brings the thrills of stock car racing to the world stage. Featuring 24 new cars from the 2016 season, an all-new career mode, updated gameplay mechanics, and a new destination, the NASCAR Expansion lets you experience the power of NASCAR as only Forza Motorsport 6 can deliver.
